titles.title: A bill for the relief of Calvin L. Graham.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-1014.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1142.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/8/1987--Introduced. Deems a named individual to have served on active duty in the U.S. Navy during a specified period for purposes of all laws administered by the Veterans Administration. Provides for the classification of such individual's dental injuries as a permanent service-connected disability and for reimbursement of costs incurred in their treatment. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to such individual interest on sums certified as representing amounts of basic pay and pay upon separation from service.
